EmailTemplate.description: Initial Response to the Customer, triggered manually & Mobile App
EmailTemplate.name: Initial Response to Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Initial Response Notification for Case : {!Case.CaseNumber} Product : {!Case.CH_Product_Name__c}, {!Case.Reference_Number__c}, [ {!Case.Thread_Id} ]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
I have received your Case and I am working on the issue reported. I will be contacting you as needed so we may solve the issue.
The Case number is {!Case.CaseNumber}, with the Product identified as {!Case.CH_Product_Name__c} reported to Nokia at {!Case.CH_ReportedDate__c}.
We have recorded the issue reported as: {!Case.Subject}. The assigned Severity of this case is {!Case.Severity__c}
Should you need to follow up on this case, please use this Case Number, {!Case.CaseNumber} as reference.
If you would like to view or update your case online, please click here:
If you do not have online access, you may register here:
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName}
